title: Glock 19 Gen5
description: The Glock 19 Gen5 is a compact 9mm pistol known for its reliability and versatility. Features a 15-round magazine capacity and polymer frame.

title: Sig Sauer P320 Full Size
description: The Sig Sauer P320 is a modular pistol system with a striker-fired design. Comes with two 17-round magazines.

title: Smith & Wesson M&P 2.0
description: The M&P 2.0 features an enhanced trigger, superior ergonomics, and a tactile loaded chamber indicator.

title: Ruger GP100
description: A rugged double-action revolver with a 6-round capacity and stainless steel construction.

title: Colt 1911 Government
description: The iconic Colt 1911 Government model chambered in .45 ACP, featuring a 7-round magazine.

title: Palmetto State Armory AR-15 M4 Carbine
description: A complete AR-15 rifle with 16-inch barrel, featuring a carbine-length gas system and A2 front sight.

title: Century Arms WASR-10
description: A Romanian-made AK-47 style rifle with a 16.25-inch barrel and 30-round magazine capacity.

title: Remington 870 Express
description: A reliable pump-action shotgun with a 28-inch barrel and 4-round capacity.

title: Mossberg 500 Combo
description: A versatile pump-action shotgun with interchangeable barrels for hunting and home defense.

title: Winchester Model 94
description: A classic lever-action rifle chambered in .30-30 Winchester with a 20-inch octagon barrel.

title: Beretta 92FS
description: The Beretta 92FS is a double-action/single-action pistol with a 15-round magazine capacity.

title: Heckler & Koch USP
description: A full-size .45 ACP pistol with a polymer frame and 12-round magazine capacity.

title: Springfield XD
description: A striker-fired pistol with a 16-round magazine and Ultra Safety Assurance trigger system.

title: CZ 75 SP-01
description: A full-size 9mm pistol with a 18-round magazine and double-action/single-action trigger.

title: FN 509
description: A striker-fired pistol with a 17-round magazine and cold hammer forged barrel.

title: DPMS Oracle
description: An AR-15 style rifle with a 16-inch barrel and A3 flattop upper receiver.

title: Savage 110 Ultralite
description: A lightweight bolt-action rifle with a carbon fiber stock and 22-inch barrel.

title: Benelli M2
description: A semi-automatic shotgun with a 28-inch barrel and 3-inch chamber.

title: Weatherby Vanguard
description: A bolt-action rifle with a 24-inch barrel and Monte Carlo stock.

title: Taurus PT111
description: A compact 9mm pistol with a 12-round magazine and polymer frame.

title: Kimber Ultra Carry
description: A compact .45 ACP pistol with a 7-round magazine and aluminum frame.

title: Walther PPQ
description: A striker-fired pistol with a 15-round magazine and Quick Defense trigger.

title: Browning Buck Mark
description: A .22 LR pistol with a 10-round magazine and alloy frame.

title: Marlin 336
description: A lever-action rifle with a 20-inch barrel and American black walnut stock.
